title: Are Canon back on top in specs race? Sony a7 V and Canon EOS R6 Mark III comparison
description: The Canon EOS R6 Mark III is the first mid-range Canon EOS R camera that’s a true contender for top-specs in the $2800 price region. What’s even more impressive is that Canon are achieving full frame 4K/120p with no crop and 12bit 7K 60P RAW video without a s…
